input_email_body:
Subject: Connectivity Issues with Cisco Router

Dear Customer Support,

I am experiencing sporadic connectivity issues with my recently purchased Cisco Router ISR4331. The connection drops unexpectedly, and I suspect there may be a configuration problem You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. I'd appreciate any guidance or support you can provide to resolve this issue My name is David Kim.. Please assist at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,

<name>
<acc_num>
